items.name: Marketplacer
items.description: Marketplacer provides a platform to create, manage, and scale online marketplaces.

items.description: Mirakl offers a comprehensive solution for launching and managing online marketplaces.

items.description: Yext provides advanced search solutions that improve user experience and drive conversions.

items.name: Algolia
items.description: Algolia offers powerful search and discovery API solutions for creating fast and relevant search experiences.

items.name: Bloomreach
items.description: Bloomreach provides search and content solutions to enhance digital commerce experiences.

items.name: Constructor
items.description: Constructor delivers AI-powered search and product discovery solutions tailored to e-commerce needs.

items.name: Coveo
items.description: Coveo offers AI-driven search and recommendation solutions to personalize digital experiences.

items.name: Klevu
items.description: Klevu provides smart search solutions that enhance product discovery and user engagement.

items.name: Big Commerce
items.description: Big Commerce is a leading e-commerce platform providing businesses with the tools to build, innovate, and grow their online presence.

items.name: Bold Commerce
items.description: Bold Commerce offers e-commerce solutions that enable brands to create customized and scalable online stores.

items.name: commercetools
items.description: commercetools provides a headless commerce platform that supports flexible and scalable e-commerce architectures.

items.name: Kibo
items.description: Kibo offers an omnichannel commerce platform that supports unified shopping experiences across channels.

items.name: Nacelle
items.description: Nacelle provides a headless commerce solution that enhances site performance and scalability.

items.name: NewStore
items.description: NewStore offers a mobile retail platform that integrates online and offline shopping experiences.

items.name: VTEX
items.description: VTEX provides a collaborative commerce platform that supports complex and large-scale e-commerce operations.

items.name: Emporix
items.description: Emporix offers a cloud-native commerce platform designed for modern e-commerce needs.

items.name: Commerce Layer
items.description: Commerce Layer provides a headless commerce platform that allows businesses to manage global e-commerce operations.

items.name: Brink Commerce
items.description: Brink Commerce offers a headless commerce solution designed for high-growth and high-performance e-commerce businesses.

items.name: Branding Brand
items.description: Branding Brand provides mobile commerce solutions that enhance mobile shopping experiences and engagement.

items.name: Adyen
items.description: Adyen offers a comprehensive payment platform that supports global transactions and multiple payment methods.

items.name: Stripe
items.description: Stripe provides payment processing solutions that enable businesses to accept and manage online payments.

items.name: Akeneo
items.description: Akeneo offers a product information management (PIM) solution that helps businesses manage and enrich product data.

items.name: Bluestone PIM
items.description: Bluestone PIM provides a cloud-native PIM solution that supports efficient product data management and distribution.

items.name: inriver

items.name: Salsify
items.description: Salsify provides a PIM platform that supports product content management and syndication across multiple channels.

items.name: Pimberly
items.description: Pimberly offers a cloud-based PIM solution that helps businesses manage and enrich product data effectively.

items.name: Enactor
items.description: Enactor provides a versatile POS solution that supports seamless in-store transactions and customer experiences.

items.name: Sitoo
items.description: Sitoo offers a cloud-based POS system that integrates online and offline sales channels.

items.name: Mercaux
items.description: Mercaux provides a mobile POS solution that enhances in-store customer experiences and sales efficiency.
